mapper.select: SELECT id,free_num,free_context, create_date,update_date,view_rate, free_category,free_like,title FROM free_board; ORDER BY free_num desc
mapper.update: UPDATE free_board SET a = b WHERE id = :v0 AND free_num = :v1 AND free_context = :v2 AND create_date = :v3 AND update_date = :v4 AND view_rate = :v5 AND free_category = :v6 AND free_like = :v7 AND title = :v8;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM free_board WHERE id = :v0 AND free_num = :v1 AND free_context = :v2 AND create_date = :v3 AND update_date = :v4 AND view_rate = :v5 AND free_category = :v6 AND free_like = :v7 AND title = :v8;
